reviewText: Great Story ! Should be seen by all American Patriots !
If you're sick of watching murders, mayhem & gratuitous sex, I highly recommend 'Ride for Lance'.  I cried, but it renewed my faith in humanity & made me even prouder to be an American.
Great documentary about how Lance's war buddies honored him. I watched it a couple of times. It was unbelievable how people rallied around the ride. Good watch.
Lots of great scenery that underscores a terrific story!
Yes.  I knew the individual.  It was very emotional and very caring.  Well made and you delivered it right on time and not problems with the shipping at all.

"RIDE FOR LANCE" shows you that these Warriors are ordinary people w/parents, wives, children and friends that deal w/ grief and loss just like you and me. Their Bond to each other is the difference. The scenery was breathtaking to say the least during the filming of the cross country trip. Scott McTavish captures the essence of friendship through a variety of human emotions shown by Lance's Mother and friends.
